description_translations.en: Coordinate the implementation of travel plans and manage any real-time issues that arise. This phase involves logistical management and real-time updates to ensure smooth trip execution.
description_translations.es: Coordinar la implementación de los planes de viaje y gestionar cualquier problema en tiempo real que surja. Esta fase implica la gestión logística y actualizaciones en tiempo real para garantizar la ejecución fluida del viaje.
description_translations.it: Coordinare l'implementazione dei piani di viaggio e gestire eventuali problemi in tempo reale. Questa fase prevede la gestione logistica e aggiornamenti in tempo reale per garantire l'esecuzione del viaggio senza intoppi.
description_translations.lv: Koordinēt ceļojuma plānu īstenošanu un pārvaldīt jebkuras reāllaika problēmas, kas rodas. Šis posms ietver loģistikas pārvaldību un reāllaika atjauninājumus, lai nodrošinātu ceļojuma veiksmīgu īstenošanu.

name_translations.en: Implement travel plans and manage real-time issues
name_translations.es: Implementar planes de viaje y gestionar problemas en tiempo real
name_translations.it: Implementare i piani di viaggio e gestire i problemi in tempo reale
name_translations.lv: Īstenot ceļojuma plānus un pārvaldīt reāllaika problēmas

description_translations.en: Ensure all travel logistics are in place and manage any issues that arise during the trip.
description_translations.es: Asegurar que toda la logística de viaje esté en su lugar y gestionar cualquier problema que surja durante el viaje.
description_translations.it: Assicurarsi che tutta la logistica di viaggio sia a posto e gestire eventuali problemi durante il viaggio.
description_translations.lv: Nodrošiniet visu ceļojuma loģistiku un pārvaldiet jebkādas problēmas, kas rodas ceļojuma laikā.

description_translations.en: Ensure that all bookings, transportation, and accommodations are confirmed and ready for the trip.
description_translations.es: Asegurarse de que todas las reservas, transportes y alojamientos estén confirmados y listos para el viaje.
description_translations.it: Assicurati che tutte le prenotazioni, i trasporti e gli alloggi siano confermati e pronti per il viaggio.
description_translations.lv: Pārliecinieties, ka visas rezervācijas, transports un naktsmītnes ir apstiprinātas un gatavas ceļojumam.

name_translations.en: Track expenses and adjust budget as necessary
name_translations.es: Rastrear gastos y ajustar el presupuesto según sea necesario
name_translations.it: Monitora le spese e aggiusta il budget secondo necessità
name_translations.lv: Sekojiet līdzi izdevumiem un, ja nepieciešams, pielāgojiet budžetu

description_translations.en: Monitor expenses during the trip and make adjustments to the budget as needed to stay within financial constraints.
description_translations.es: Monitorear los gastos durante el viaje y hacer ajustes al presupuesto según sea necesario para mantenerse dentro de las limitaciones financieras.
description_translations.it: Monitora le spese durante il viaggio e apporta modifiche al budget secondo necessità per rispettare i limiti finanziari.
description_translations.lv: Ceļojuma laikā uzraugiet izdevumus un nepieciešamības gadījumā veiciet izmaiņas budžetā, lai paliktu finanšu ierobežojumu ietvaros.

interlinkers.name: Google Drive
interlinkers.description: Tool for sharing and accessing important travel documents, itineraries, and plans in real time.

interlinkers.name: Event Organizer (EVO)
interlinkers.description: Management tool for coordinating and allocating travel-related resources and services.

interlinkers.name: Mailchimp
interlinkers.description: Communication tool to provide regular updates to participants during the trip.
